title: Badge of Honor (Romance, 1934) Buster Crabbe, Ruth Hall, Ralph Lewis | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Badge of Honor (Romance, 1934) Buster Crabbe, Ruth Hall, Ralph Lewis | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Spoiled wealthy playboy Bob Gordon (Buster Crabbe) ends up in a small town overrun by corrupt local politicians. When his encounter with the charming Helen Brewster ignites a newfound determination. Bob takes on the guise of a journalist, driven by a desire to expose the town's crooked officials and bring them to justice.

Original title: Badge of Honor (1934)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/oR1tYbW3PFU


Director: Spencer Gordon Bennet
Writers: George Morgan, Robert Emmett Tansey
Stars: Buster Crabbe, Ruth Hall, Ralph Lewis, Betty Blythe
Genres: Colorized classics, Drama, Romance 

@CultCinemaClassics Members-only videos https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
